Detailed Description

tcb.h: A Thread Control Block (or TCB) is a structure that represents the status of a thread into the Operating System.

TCBs are principally used by the scheduler. This module is divided in three sub-modules:

  • allocating/deallocating TCBs;
  • managing queues of TCBs;
  • managing trees of Threads.

Define Documentation

#define MAXTHREADS   128

Maximum number of threads.
